name: Monster-Cockfighting
description:
I made this in a week and it kicks ass! There's two endings.
CONTROLS

Z = Interact/Next Message
X = Cancel
D = Running

During combat
A = Attack
D = Dodge

Oh yeah, controllers should work if that's more your style. Just D-pad though, no sticks yet.

If people like this I'll expand on it. I'll add more monsters, randomized opponents and actual gambling. And more endings of course.

CREDITS

The music is all by White Bat Audio except for the title screen.
Some of the stage pieces and the Trash Monster were made by pixcraft.net
Tiles were done by RainingLamppost from a previous project.

SPECIAL THANKS
M Dot Strange and Madsky for inspiring me to better myself.
